channel.title: Ideas
channel.description:
Yes, I know many topics have been created based on this subject. Well, I don't really need ideas as much as I need improvements/suggestions. So, here goes nothing.
This is what I have so far. It's a skilling mini-game/quest. You start out by talking to a guy at home, he then gives you four difficulties to choose from; Expert, Hard, Medium, Rookie. Whatever you choose, you're assigned a monster to kill (Expert will obviously assign you the toughest monster) after you complete the task, you then go back and talk to the guy at home, you will then receive a random 'clue-scroll'. It will contain hints to where the item(s) are located. One of them being an axe that gives x2 or x3 WC xp.
Yes, i'm aware this isn't the best, that's why I need suggestions! Help me! :rolleyes:

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:5, topic:461757”]I think there should be this.

Expert = 1/4 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Hard = 1/8 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Medium = 1/16 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Rookie = 1/32 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.[/quote]

Expert = 1/2
Hard = 1/4
Medium = 1/8
Rookie = 1/16

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

I think there should be this.

Expert = 1/4 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Hard = 1/8 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Medium = 1/16 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.
Rookie = 1/32 Chance of getting the ClueScroll.

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

the elve age:

The higher difficulty the easier it is to get a clue scroll, as with maybe winning rookie would give you a chocolate cake.

I see. So, you’d have a higher chance of getting a clue scroll choosing Expert than you would Rookie. I like it. Are there any other suggestions on how I could improve this idea? I wish for this to be flawless.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The higher difficulty the easier it is to get a clue scroll, as with maybe winning rookie would give you a chocolate cake.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

it should be a CHANCE to get a clue scroll.

:eek:
I like that idea. That’ll make it more difficult, maybe 20/80? and to make it even tougher, you can only play the mini-game once every 24-48 hours?

Read full topic
